programme.title: Massachusetts primary, March 1976
programme.short_synopsis: Massachusetts primary. Voters drift to conservatism.
programme.medium_synopsis: Massachusetts primary. Voters drift to the right. Bicentennial bull wins bad taste prize.
programme.long_synopsis:
Massachusetts primary. Voters drift to the right. Bicentennial bull wins bad taste prize.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
